name: Bishop Museum Ethnobotany Database
description: Searchable online database of Hawaiian ethnobotanical names with cultural use notes.

name: Pacific Data Hub – Indigenous Knowledge of New Guinea’s Useful Plants
description: Dataset with 40,376 use reports and 19,948 plant uses for 3,434 New Guinea species.

name: Pacific Food Trade Database (PFTD)
description: Food and beverage trade flows (1995–2022) for 18 Pacific Island countries and territories.

name: Pacific Food and Beverage Trade on Pacific Data Hub
description: Global UN-reported food trade quantities for Pacific Island countries and territories.

name: Pacific Crops – Traditional Pacific Island Crops
description: Guide to full-text resources on twelve staple Pacific Island crops.

name: Specialty Crops for Pacific Islands Agroforestry
description: Compendium covering cultivation and processing of 26 Pacific Island specialty crops.
